Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook

Class Notebook

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_tasks.model.notebook.Notebook
  • public class Notebook
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Notebook object in the WolfTasks system. A Notebook is a collection of TaskLists
    Author:
    owenloker, magolden

        Parameters:
        idx - Unique index of the task that will be edited

        active - boolean value true if the task is active
